QRCode.scanWarning:
Using WeChat to scan the QR code may not work successfully.
For iOS, you can use the camera to scan;
For Android, you can use the camera or browser to scan.
If you can't scan the code properly, you can also click the link to verify.
QRCode.verificationTitle: To verify you are human, please scan the QR code

announcement.clickHint: Click the title to expand/collapse content
announcement.contentSubmission: Content Submission: Please ensure you only upload the following file types: index.html, style.css, script.js, img.png, img.jpg. Be sure to select the correct assignment type and fill in your name accurately. This will help avoid submission errors and subsequent issues.
announcement.fileSubmission: File Submission: Please note that you do not need to compress files upon submission. The server is pre-configured for automatic matching of assignment types to ensure your submission is processed smoothly.
announcement.statusCheck: Status Check: After submission, please go to the 'Submission Status Check' module and enter your name to verify if your assignment has been submitted successfully. If you encounter any issues or questions, please post in the 'Forum' module, and we will assist you as soon as possible.
announcement.title: Announcement

contact.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact me through the following methods:

maintenance.message: We are currently undergoing system maintenance. Please try again later.
maintenance.title: Under Maintenance

notice.announcement:
Training project practice requirements:
Students are required to complete a total of 2 project internships.
This project internship will divide the class members into 5 groups, and each group will complete the static page project practice.
Project development content and PPT will be divided among group members, and each person must provide an internship report.
Each student must provide the following materials:
01. Project demonstration PPT (can be shared within the group)
02. Project code (can be shared within the group)
03. Internship report (must be submitted individually)
All students should submit the results of 2 projects by October 25.
notice.title: Project Announcement
